reviews.name: Youssef O
reviews.text: Excellent bbq wings and fast delivery. Will definitely order again.

reviews.name: Lora K.
reviews.text: The Donair and Hawaiian pizza with lemon pepper chicken wings are fire! So delicious! The only thing that I didn‚Äôt like about the pizza are the large slices of tomatoes on it. I would still give 5 stars regardless.

reviews.name: Mary Smith-Jones
reviews.text:
A lovely Airdronian recommended this restaurant to me, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! The pizzas were piping hot, loaded with delicious toppings, and not greasy at all. My kids, who are notoriously picky about pizza, loved it. My husband raved about the golden wings and is already asking when we can go back for more. The prices were incredibly reasonable‚ÄîI honestly couldn‚Äôt make the food for less at home!

What really sets this place apart, though, is the service. The staff are so friendly and helpful. It‚Äôs easy to see why people love this spot‚Äîwe certainly do! We‚Äôll definitely be regulars. Thank you so much for such a fantastic experience!

reviews.name: Samantha Johnson
reviews.text:
Pizza was delicious and was ready fast (only 15minutes after ordering)
We got the meat supreme and Hawaiian and loved both. Lots of toppings, good amount of cheese and wonderful crust!

reviews.name: Brendan M
reviews.text: I‚Äôve tried to many places in Airdrie for wings and none of them are great. I came here to try the wings after reading some reviews. The owner asked me how I like my wings which I appreciated and they ended up being so good. I highly recommend the wings and I find the value good as well. I‚Äôll be back!

reviews.name: alexis breemersch
reviews.text: The owner is amazing! The pizza is a great price and always meets the craving for good pizza! This place deserves all the love!

reviews.name: Noah Barley
reviews.text: Best pizza and wing joint in town. I‚Äôve been coming here for over 10 years. Johnny is awesome.

reviews.name: Danielle S
reviews.text: Great gluten free pizza, maybe even one of the best I've had! Lots of toppings and cheese-I'll definitely be back :)

reviews.name: Krista
reviews.text:
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Best pizza ever! My 4-year-old can‚Äôt stop talking about it‚Äîhe actually raves about how yummy it is. The crust is perfect, the toppings are always fresh, and the flavor is amazing every single time. Definitely our go-to spot for family pizza night!

reviews.name: Jenn Turner
reviews.text: Best pizza ever!

reviews.name: Sienna Chudley
reviews.text: Never ordered from Johnny‚Äôs pizza until today. I saw all the good reviews on their gluten free pizza crust, so I decided to give it a try. And I was not disappointed! I‚Äôm new to the whole gluten free thing. Pizza is one of my favourite order out meals, so I was worried that it would be hard to find a good gluten free one. But Johnny‚Äôs gluten free crust was great!! It‚Äôs thin, but very crispy and delicious! Definitely recommend to all the gluten free peeps out there!

reviews.name: Sabrina McGregor
reviews.text: We love the food here! The pizza and wings are so good. Including the gluten free pizza!

reviews.name: nik rontogiannis
reviews.text: Just ate there for the first time orderpizza and chicken wings food was hot very good sign pizza was tasty and wings where crispy

reviews.name: Shayne Davidson
reviews.text: Fast, friendly, and always good!

reviews.name: Kristin Warner
reviews.text:
Amazing pizza. Had a birthday party at spray park. Was so kind delivered to park even came in early to have pizzas for us before opening
Thanks again well be back‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.name: Aaron Lajaro
reviews.text: good overall, pizza tasted good

reviews.name: cory doonanco
reviews.text: I'm in town for work and always have a hesitation when ordering from new places. I ordered the loaded and it's a great pizza. Thank you

reviews.name: Terry Masterson
reviews.text: Went in to grab a quick slice. First time customer. Great pizza at a great price.!! I highly recommend this place.!!

reviews.name: Joline Scobie
reviews.text: The pickle pizza is divine! Gluten free crust is fantastic!

reviews.name: Anthony Dyck
reviews.text: This is by far my favorite pizza spot in Airdrie.  Family run, and they are the most polite and welcoming people!  Love supporting this place!!  Keep up the great work!!!

reviews.name: Cole Snelgrove
reviews.text: Good gluten free options and good pizza overall

reviews.name: Vee Lincoln
reviews.text: Third time ordering and absolutely love the pizza and the service. The 2 for 1 deal is awesome.

reviews.name: Jordan Hjelsvold
reviews.text: The pizza and wings are all really great. One of our local favorites.

reviews.name: Julie Ha
reviews.text: Tried this place for the first time through delivery and was very happy with the pizza and wings.  The person I spoke to on the phone was friendly and the food arrived really quick.  Loved my experience so much that I ended up ordering again tonight.  Highly recommend!!

reviews.name: Bry Bonk
reviews.text:
Wings are so good! Pizza was pretty good!
Prices very reasonable! Will order again!

reviews.name: k amyotte
reviews.text: I‚Äôve supported this company well over 10 years. Pleasant staff always, great delivery people and good food as always. Best wings!

reviews.name: Bruce Robertson
reviews.text: Always excellent service and the pizza is really good.

reviews.name: Amanda Fitch
reviews.text: Johnny's accommodated our large order on short notice, including gluten-free accommodations. Great service and delicious pizza. Thanks so much!

reviews.name: B K
reviews.text: The best wings in Airdrie, Cooked to perfection every time and sauced to perfection.

reviews.name: Jackie Campbell
reviews.text: Great pizza every time. My favorite in Airdrie.

reviews.name: Gabriella
reviews.text: Wow! Amazing pizza for a great price!! This was probably one of the best pizzas I've had in a while.

reviews.name: Travis Fike
reviews.text: The food is great. The atmosphere is a little run down on the inside so I would jot recommend sitting in amd eating.

reviews.name: Ethan Proulx
reviews.text: Pizza tasted great.  Ordered delivery on a weekday night.  The food arrived in decent timing.  Feels good to support a small local business.

reviews.name: Erin Degenstein
reviews.text:
Amazing pizza and wings!
The gluten free pizza is also great as are the wings. We will definitely be ordering again from Johnny‚Äôs soon!

reviews.name: John Kubbernus
reviews.text:
The BEST Dill Pickle Pizza in Town. Fast service, never disappointed.

Lake Season is our Friday grab and go driving to Red Deer.

May here we come

THANK YOU

reviews.name: Amanda Garner
reviews.text: This is our go to pizza place. The kids love it, lots of cheese and a good crust.

reviews.name: Ryan Mcgowan
reviews.text: Excellent pizza Excellent customer service! The brothers working there or owners are super awesome. They will make you a custom pizza if you like aswell! Top 3 in pizza in airdrie! Keep up the good work johnny's!!!!!

reviews.name: J L
reviews.text: We typically order wings but their pizza is good as well.  The food is fresh and our order is always correct.  If you visit the restaurant,  the kitchen is impeccable which we respect and appreciate.  Service is always great.

reviews.name: Kingsley Uwaezu
reviews.text: Johnny is doing well!

reviews.name: petros tesfay
reviews.text: Very delicious for decent money , recommended fr

reviews.name: Craig Kay
reviews.text: Nice service

reviews.name: Terry Nichol
reviews.text: Very good pizza. And good prices compared to all these other overpriced places

reviews.name: Jennifer Lawrence
reviews.text: Love the pizza and wings

reviews.name: Chris Wirsch
reviews.text: Been ordering here for years.  Always hot and fresh.  Love Johnny's!

reviews.name: young_optic
reviews.text: Amazing pizza

reviews.name: Muyiwa Taiwo
reviews.text:
The staff were remarkably polite and the wings tasted so good.
I am yet to try the pizza but I bet it tastes as good or better than the wings.

reviews.name: Kendra Doyle
reviews.text:
Great gluten free pizza. This was our 2nd time and both times were really good! Had the dill pickle tonight, with bacon instead of mushrooms  and OMG ü§§
Definitely will be our go to place. Prices very reasonable too, and looking forward to trying gluten free wings next time

reviews.name: Johnny Boi
reviews.text: Best pizza ever y'all are better than dominos

reviews.name: Jenea Taylor
reviews.text: Johnny‚Äôs pizza and wings are delicious. Always fresh and hot. We have been eating their pizza for almost 10 years now. It‚Äôs a family run business which we have enjoyed watching the kids grow. Also delivering our pizza and wings too.

reviews.name: Mark Boman
reviews.text: Tried Johnny's Pizza for the first time today.  Pizza was excellent, but the wings were even better.  Ordered a Pepperoni, Bacon, Mushroom and Italian Sausage Pizza and Salt & Pepper wings.  Great food at good prices.  New go to for Pizza in Airdrie!

reviews.name: kayla pinkney
reviews.text: We love the dill pickle pizza and the donair pizza..every pizza we tried was great including the wings

reviews.name: Ground Force
reviews.text: Awesome gluten free pizzaüçï, friendly staff... Highly recommend üëç

reviews.name: Chauncey Rash
reviews.text: Always good and fast delivery, definitely our go-to here!

reviews.name: MissC
reviews.text: Always amazing food! Fast service, great value!

reviews.name: Maryjane Holteen
reviews.text:
LUV Johnny's Pizza...I've tried a few places in Airdrie but this by far is the best pizza out there. It's not over stacked with cheese, or processed meat, but just the right amount of anything you order on your pizza. Theyre friendly, their delivery service is quick and the food ALWAYS arrives hot.
Guess what we're having for our supper üòã Thank you Johnny's Pizza

reviews.name: Andre
reviews.text: Best pizza place ever. Didn't open at 11 am though :(

reviews.name: Cory Beck
reviews.text: Price was good and the pizza was also good.

reviews.name: Serena Kolodka
reviews.text: I tasted Johnny's gluten free pizza on New Year's Eve and was blown away! Amazing service and fast delivery and such a kind delivery person. Pizza was great with thin crust and generous toppings. I bought for the family in Jan and everyone was impressed!! My new go-to pizza place! And it is local too!

reviews.name: GiuseppeandKoleta Nicoletti
reviews.text: Best pizza in Airdrie in my opinion we Love ya Johnny keep it up 5 üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº up.

reviews.name: Speak up
reviews.text:
My family and I are satisfied with their pizza!   The Pizza has a good undercarriage even with the heavy toppings and  without being over cooked!
Sauce has a good taste,  real toppings and complimented with a good amount of cheese!  We will definitely be going back!

(Left Donair Pizza, right is Super Loaded Pizza)

reviews.name: Kyle Wudrich
reviews.text: Great pizza and wings! Fast service!

reviews.name: Koleta Nicoletti
reviews.text: Amazing pizza and service!! We didn't get pizza from Johnny in a while and forgot how tasty it is, glad we ordered for pick-up last night. Johnny never disappoints

reviews.name: tusicanada
reviews.text: Wings were awesome they added some curry fries free of charge

reviews.name: Kyla Webber
reviews.text: Very good food! My hubby ordered the super hot wings and said he was very impressed, I will add that tears were rolling down his face! Lol he is on fire! The honey hot wings is very very good as well highly recommend Johnny's Pizza & Wings

reviews.name: Joshua Kroeger
reviews.text: 10/10 will be ordering here more often. It's my new favorite

reviews.name: Jamie Smith
reviews.text: Pizza is always amazing!

reviews.name: Lisa Stevens
reviews.text: I love their food! Excellent price, friendly service, quick delivery

reviews.name: Cait Teichroeb
reviews.text: I like simple food which means it tends to be bland but my pizza and hot wings were superb.  The gentleman even refired my wings because my order ended up sitting and waiting for me for a while, but it all still tasted fresh and delicious.  Portions and quality far exceeded what I expected at the price point.  Little Caesars price point for far superior food.

reviews.name: Kate F
reviews.text: Amazing pizza and amazing customer service! We love the pizza here!

reviews.name: Elizabeth Firstbrook
reviews.text: Great pizza now my only pizza great delivery and service

reviews.name: Nisrine Kahwaji
reviews.text: Good prices and tasty pizza. It tastes more like a home made pizza which is great!

reviews.name: Jordan Bijl
reviews.text:
Great pizza
Coming home from a late night service call  and these guys were open still, sorta like pizza 73 but better tasting, fresh, lots of options on there menu and the price was awesome!
Thanks for the late night pizza that really hit the spot, will definately stop by more often! Support local!

reviews.name: Ania
reviews.text:
Really good pizza and amazing service! Everyone was friendly and quick with delivery. Pizza so good!!
To the guy who gave a one star because ‚Äúslices weren‚Äôt the same size‚Äù - common dude - that‚Äôs the most ridiculous comment ever and doesn‚Äôt deserve a one star. You‚Äôre an idiot.

reviews.name: seth m
reviews.text: Donair pizza was delicious. Fast service.We would recommend.

reviews.name: Jacob Holloway
reviews.text: Amazing food and good service!

reviews.name: Balkaran Matharu
reviews.text: Tried this pizza a few nights ago for the first time. Moved to Airdrie recently and I've been attempting to try all the local pizza shops. Johnny's was awesome! Pizza was super cheesy and saucy, and was delicious! Really happy with it and enjoyed the pie. Service was exceptional and fast as well. Support local businesses!

reviews.name: Catrina Godon
reviews.text: Terrific tasting pizza with lots of toppings and a great crust!

reviews.name: Travis Ell
reviews.text: This has been our favourite pizza place in Airdrie for years now, after discovering it via word of mouth from a friend. They're reasonably priced, super consistent quality-wise, and the pizza is great.

reviews.name: Tracy F
reviews.text: Good service, great pizza!

reviews.name: SickofLies
reviews.text: Great pizza, really good wings! üëçüëç

reviews.name: Carmicheal Hodgson
reviews.text: Best pizza and wings in town for the best price. We order here at least once a month.

reviews.name: Ayla Agecoutay
reviews.text: Huge shoutout to Johnny's Pizza, we always order from them because our household thinks they have the best pizza and wings. And on top of it they have amazing customer service. Keep doing what you guys our doing! We love Johnny's pizza!

reviews.name: Jamie Brown
reviews.text: Quality, timeliness, portion. 5 stars thank you.

reviews.name: Kevin
reviews.text: If you want a pizza you'll remember, a pizza that will make you forgot any pizza that came before it, then go here. Everytime is the exact same, it's like they have a pizza making machine in the back turning out duplicate pizzas. I gave 5 stars because that is all I can give. Eat here now! You won't be disappointed.

reviews.name: Zierlyn
reviews.text:
I love wings. I typically get wings once or twice a month. A couple days ago I was passing through Airdrie and decided to grab myself some wings as a snack for my trip home and to my surprise I got the best wings I've eaten in probably the last 5 years.

The breading was light, crispy, and flavourful. The meat was juicy and tender. I'll definitely be back. The only suggestion I can make is: have you ever considered selling individual cups of home-made dipping sauces? I found myself thinking I would have loved a curry or vindaloo to dip my wings into...

Actually, if you'll excuse me, I have to go imagine the taste of a pizza with vindaloo instead of pizza sauce...

reviews.name: L. L.
reviews.text:
Unassumingly wonderful pizza.
Complete value for money.
Tried out a special order on the Meat Supreme to double all the meat and easy on cheese...omg... my kids had tears of JOY on every bite!! Well-done guys, keep it up.

reviews.name: Steven Hewitt
reviews.text: Very excited to have discovered this place! Coming from a small town with a great pizza place we were a little disheartened with the price of pizza in Airdrie. This is the second time ordering from Johnny's and it is now our go to pizza place. Lightening fast delivery, great prices and tasty pizza, thanks again!

reviews.name: Benjamin Ng
reviews.text: Excellent value and my new favourite pizza place in Airdrie!  I never knew about Johnny's until I searched the AmEx "Shop Small" promo, which lead me to place an order for pick-up.  I was told my order would be ready in 10-12 minutes, and indeed, when I arrived, it was ready!  The Royal Deluxe that I ordered looked and tasted great, and had the right amounts of everything.  I will definitely be returning, and this will be my "go to" for pizza!

reviews.name: Louise Anderson
reviews.text: Wow! Best pizza we've had in Airdrie!

reviews.name: Phillip Horovitz
reviews.text: Great Pizza.  That is my family's go to place for pizza.

reviews.name: Tyler Harrison
reviews.text: Very tasty, very good pizza.

reviews.name: brenda murley
reviews.text: We were very pleased. Ordered for pickup. The two for one deal was very well priced. Service was great, Friendly staff and was ready when promised. Pizza was well made. The toppings were distributed evenly and in proportion to the crust thickness. Didn‚Äôt slide off when you take a bite. Great flavour. Cooked properly. Will definitely order again.

reviews.name: Chung Niem
reviews.text: Thank you for feeding health care & other essential workers!!

reviews.name: Chris
reviews.text: Pretty good and tasty pizza. Good prices too

reviews.name: Andrew Spielman
reviews.text: Awesome value, pizza was excellent and the wings were even better! There is no reason to order from a chain pizza place with this place in town. Just wish we would have tried Johnny's sooner. Pizza cottage sucks do not listen to the other reviews... Great job guys!

reviews.name: Scott Brockway
reviews.text: Great tasting pizza.

reviews.name: Heather Allon
reviews.text: Customer service is excellent and the food is always great!

reviews.name: Sebastien Chabot
reviews.text: Pretty good pizza. Helpful staff. Prices are ok.

reviews.name: Alan Shaw
reviews.text: The best Pizza in town. I've been going to them for years & always had great food with great service at a good price

reviews.name: Glenn Smaha
reviews.text: Value for your money is awesome. Great tasting pizza!

reviews.name: Eva RV
reviews.text: Pizza is amazing! Staff is amazing. Timing is amazing!  üëçüèºüëçüèº

reviews.name: Tony Wourms
reviews.text: Good Cheap Pizza. What's not to love?

reviews.name: ahad Chaudhry
reviews.text: You know, life is full of mysteries...The suspense is real when it comes to finding the perfect pizza. After years of pizza tasting, it has all come down to the best looking pizza deliverer. The most beautiful and attractive pizza deliverer Yuvraj has changed the entire pizza game. Although I haven't had a taste of this pizza. I can assure you it is 5 stars due to the fact that the delivery man, Yuvraj was just so irresistibly cute.

reviews.name: Michael Mawby
reviews.text: Pizza is always amazing!!

reviews.name: Carl Perlinger
reviews.text: We ordered 8 pizzas for a birthday party, we were late to order, as we forgot to order. They were still able to turn around the order and deliver it on time. The pizza was delicious as usual and service is second to none.

reviews.name: Dorinda A.
reviews.text: Got pizzas to pick up, they were done really quickly, the price was excellent and the pizza was yummy!!

reviews.name: Krystal Murray
reviews.text: Wings are awesome!! My Go-to!! Havent tried the pizza yet, but will be back again and again... :)

reviews.name: The Brookshaws
reviews.text: Shockingly good!!! The sauce could use a little more spice but its 2nd to Paul's.

reviews.name: Neil Ranson
reviews.text: Always great pizza friendly staff, we are so pleased the gluten free pizza is cared for with no cross contamination you look after your customers and it is appreciated

reviews.name: Anthony Traverse
reviews.text: Great tasting pizza

reviews.name: Colleen Ann Bennett
reviews.text: Johnny's Pizza is a good affordable pizza place.. I personally love there wings alot they are delicious and priced well.. There pizza is always warm but I'm not the biggest fan. But there wings are a win for me

reviews.name: Jacob Miller
reviews.text: Great service good pizza excellent wings!

reviews.name: Bill Nadraszky
reviews.text: Great tasting pizza and usuay have $1.25 individual pizza slices

reviews.name: Tim Clow
reviews.text:
This place is great place for quick stop and grab a bite.
He has $1.25 slices, and they taste really good! Great value, and he's very amiable. To me it's a perfect place for a quick lunch stop!
2 of us had a couple pieces of pizza, and an ice tea and it wasn't 11 bucks!
Not much for decor but I think it's a great place to have a quick pizza as it's usually ready when you walk in.
Although it's not a restaurant per se. I think he deserves a bit better than 4 stars for what he does and the niche her is in.

reviews.name: Jason Lamey
reviews.text: Absolutely incredible.

reviews.name: christa bowtell
reviews.text: Our pizza is always fresh and hot when delivered and tastes great for a great price. The service I can not say enough about. Always polite on the phone and delivery is always fast. The people who deliver the pizza are also so kind and great to my kids. What stands out is definitely the service. I ordered pizza one day as I was sick and the delivery guy was a young man who knew I was sick and ordered pizza for my kids so I could rest. While I was paying he grabbed my shovel and shovel my steps and sidewalk for me as it had snowed the day before and I was physically unable to shovel. Great ppl and great pizza.

reviews.name: Travis Curtis
reviews.text: Love thier pizza.

reviews.name: Stephen Pickett
reviews.text: Yum, this was really great pizza. Lots of cheese and toppings. Great price too!

reviews.name: Rob Caissy
reviews.text: Great pizza, awesome staff. Kids love it.

reviews.name: Stu
reviews.text: Great Pizza and Value

reviews.name: TheBeard73
reviews.text: Golden wings are the best in town! Only matched by the friendly family atmosphere and service.

reviews.name: Brock Bailey
reviews.text: Since my last review things are on the up and up.. i am addicted to there cheese. Hmmm cheese. Hard working family runs this place. I will come back.

reviews.name: Doug Nelson
reviews.text: Good pizza at a good price

reviews.name: Johnny Wenzel
reviews.text:
Everytime I get pizza in Airdrie, I get Johnny's (complete coincidence that my name is also Johnny). Nothing too fancy,  just some really good pizza that will never disappoint.

The cheese is its best quality.

reviews.name: D D
reviews.text: Good pizza place, taste delicious. And their gluten free pizzas are good as well

reviews.name: Charlie Beaulieu
reviews.text: My go to pizza place in Airdrie. Too notch pizza and great service. Always quick to answer and get the pizza ready within 20 minutes. Best pizza place in Airdrie by far. Also their prices are incredibly fair for 2 pizzas. No problems paying those prices.

reviews.name: featherheadstudios
reviews.text:
Great pizza, great locally run business..
Support local and order from here instead of your big name box stores : food quality is better and very well priced

reviews.name: Jordan Volf
reviews.text: Great pizza awesome staff

reviews.name: Bryce Callander
reviews.text: Solid pizza and wings

reviews.name: J M
reviews.text: Great pizza and wings. Always fast and friendly.

reviews.name: Wes
reviews.text: Our favorite pizza place in town. Good pizza menu and decent price for take out. Excellent by the slice price at only 1.25$! I don't think you can get that anywhere else in Calgary area.

reviews.name: jim lahey
reviews.text: Great pizza, owner is a little bit salty and rude lol

reviews.name: Preach er
reviews.text: The pizza was really good and fresh !!!  Really good customer service and i got to say the  meet pizza was AMAZING  . Thanks johnny üòÅüòÅ

reviews.name: Harry Stergiou
reviews.text: Good customer service,best pizza!

reviews.name: Lothbrook
reviews.text: Best pizza amazing wings dedication to quality!

reviews.name: Meghan Taylor
reviews.text:
We ordered a pepperoni and a meat lovers plus hot wings.
Delivery was extremely fast.
Food was so hot and fresh.
This was my first time ordering from this pizza company and I wasn't dissapointed. I got extremely good value and flavor was good.
I like my pizzas with a delicious crust and this one was ok. It wasn't my favorite but the family enjoyed it and we will order again for sure.

reviews.name: Steve Klassen
reviews.text: What can you say... family run local business that makes great pizza in minutes. Pizza is usually done in 12 minutes! Great place!

reviews.name: Cory Calhoun
reviews.text: Excellent pizza and wings. I have always got what I ordered and taste has always hit the spot. The prices are very very reasonable and compared to other pizza joints the toppings are almost double then what what you get everywhere else for again way less the price. I recommend trying it out As I will continue going there myself. I hope you all feel the same same.

reviews.name: Brent F
reviews.text: Always good value, good wings highly recommend

reviews.name: Jason Slawosky
reviews.text: Amazing pizza and wings and very friendly staff. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Daniel Sawyer
reviews.text: Friendly owner, great tasting pizzas, and you can't beat the price.  Go ahead and give them a try!

reviews.name: Ben Gorniak
reviews.text: Johnny's pizza is simply fantastic. A family owned gem in the heart of Airdrie that everyone deserves to go to. The effort they put into their pizza is noticed and I always look forward to ordering from them.

reviews.name: James Creador
reviews.text: Gr8 deals for a gr8 price! Me and the kids love this place!

reviews.name: Sara Regamble
reviews.text: Best pizza I've ever had! They deliver very fast on weekends too!

reviews.name: Abdul Zahabi
reviews.text: Pizza is always fresh and service is always excellent

reviews.name: Fauteux Travel
reviews.text: Johnny's Pizza & Wings

reviews.name: Chris Nicholson
reviews.text: Awesome price, great food and friendly staff.

reviews.name: Shawn Edward
reviews.text: Great pizza , AWESOME deep fried pickles & amazing service

reviews.name: Luba Maskel
reviews.text:
Love love love this place
Always great taste

reviews.name: Sean Schwartz
reviews.text: Wicked pizza at a good price, delivered in half an hour on a Saturday night. Definitely going to be a repeat customer.

reviews.name: Michelle Orr
reviews.text: Best pizza in airdrie . Only pizza my kids will eat . Affordable and tasty . Unlike Sophie's it was beyond disgusting

reviews.name: Trevor Engstrom
reviews.text:
Some of the best pizza I've ever had, they almost always have some kind of deal on, and will make your pizza as quickly as 15 minutes on a Saturday night.

Do not pass up a chance to get this if you need a great pizza fix.
